data.oai_dc:dc: GFNMS: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Bodega Head, California, USA (BOD001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Bodega Head, California, USA, by GFNMS. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2005-08-10. The instrument depth was 005 meters, in an overall water depth of 31 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
